Html:
Hi,

I have an up to date Server 2008R2 configured as WSUS Server.

I installed the Package Publisher locally and still get the notification each time I connect:

"Server Version is different from console version. You won't be able to publish updates."

I can see that the server version is: 3.2.7600.236 and the console version: 3.2.7600.226.

As far as I know this is normal for WSUS 3.0 SP2.

Any chances that I can fix this?

Thank you!

That was exactly what I was looking for. It helped!
Norbert is right. Wsus will not let a user to locally publish an update if the console version didn't match the server version.
